bancoInst[0] = 32'b011011_00000_11100_0000000001100011;		//LOADI	28,99
bancoInst[1] = 32'b011011_00000_11110_0000000001100101;		//LOADI	30,101
bancoInst[2] = 32'b011011_00000_11101_0000000001100100;		//LOADI	29,100
bancoInst[3] = 32'b011011_00000_00000_0000000000000000;		//LOADI	0,0
bancoInst[4] = 32'b011011_00000_11111_0000000000100100;		//LOADI	31,_Fim
bancoInst[5] = 32'b010100_00000000000000000000010110;		//J	main
bancoInst[6] = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;		//LABEL	funcb
bancoInst[7] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000001001;		//LOADI	1,9
bancoInst[8] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000010;		//OUT	2,1
bancoInst[9] = 32'b010011_11111_00000_00000_00000000000;		//JR	31
bancoInst[10] = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;		//LABEL	func
bancoInst[11] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000000111;		//LOADI	1,7
bancoInst[12] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000001;		//OUT	1,1
bancoInst[13] = 32'b011010_11100_11111_0000000000000000;		//STORE	31,0,28
bancoInst[14] = 32'b000100_11100_11100_0000000000000001;		//SUBI	28,28,1
bancoInst[15] = 32'b000010_11110_11110_0000000000000001;		//ADDI	30,30,1
bancoInst[16] = 32'b010101_00000000000000000000000110;		//JAL	funcb
bancoInst[17] = 32'b000010_11100_11100_0000000000000001;		//ADDI	28,28,1
bancoInst[18] = 32'b011001_11100_11111_0000000000000000;		//LOAD	31,0,28
bancoInst[19] = 32'b011001_11110_00001_0000000000000000;		//LOAD	1,0,30
bancoInst[20] = 32'b000100_11110_11110_0000000000000001;		//SUBI	30,30,1
bancoInst[21] = 32'b010011_11111_00000_00000_00000000000;		//JR	31
bancoInst[22] = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;		//LABEL	main
bancoInst[23] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000000101;		//LOADI	1,5
bancoInst[24] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000000;		//OUT	0,1
bancoInst[25] = 32'b011010_11100_11111_0000000000000000;		//STORE	31,0,28
bancoInst[26] = 32'b000100_11100_11100_0000000000000001;		//SUBI	28,28,1
bancoInst[27] = 32'b000010_11110_11110_0000000000000001;		//ADDI	30,30,1
bancoInst[28] = 32'b010101_00000000000000000000001010;		//JAL	func
bancoInst[29] = 32'b000010_11100_11100_0000000000000001;		//ADDI	28,28,1
bancoInst[30] = 32'b011001_11100_11111_0000000000000000;		//LOAD	31,0,28
bancoInst[31] = 32'b011001_11110_00001_0000000000000000;		//LOAD	1,0,30
bancoInst[32] = 32'b000100_11110_11110_0000000000000001;		//SUBI	30,30,1
bancoInst[33] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000000010;		//LOADI	1,2
bancoInst[34] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000000;		//OUT	0,1
bancoInst[35] = 32'b010011_11111_00000_00000_00000000000;		//JR	31
bancoInst[36] = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;		//LABEL	_Fim
bancoInst[37] = 32'b111111_00000000000000000000000000;		//HALT
